tag_list: ugo, engage-digital, austin, entrepreneur, photographer, traveler
overview:
Chris is an entrepreneur, avid traveler and photographer.

Chris is the founder and CEO of Engage Digital - http://www.EngageDigital.com , conference production company that has produced events in New York, San Francisco, London, Seattle, Austin and elsewhere.

Chris been involved in a number of startups having founded UGO Networks (now owned by IGN), The Game Initiative / Austin Game Conference (now GDC Online), Texas Entrepreneur Initiative and Multimedia Wire. He has also served as a Mentor at Capital Factory and was involved at United Devices. He maintains a travel photo blog at http://www.ChristophersTravels.com .
